chunk:
Asepxia Charcoal Acne Bar Soap (2018 formulation)

Brand: Asepxia

Category: Bar Soap

Ingredients: Active Ingredients: SALICYLIC ACID 2.0%; Inactive Ingredients: SODIUM PALMATE, SODIUM COCOATE AND/OR SODIUM PALM KERNELATE, WATER, GLYCERIN, ACTIVATED CHARCOAL, SODIUM CHLORIDE, IRON OXIDE (CI 77499), PENTASODIUM PENTETATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity
